full_summary:
**Tender Announcement: Request for Proposal for TBIPS Services - Solicitation 9F032-21-0447**

The Canadian Space Agency (CSA) invites bids to provide Task-Based Informatics Professional Services (TBIPS) [1] under the Solicitation Number 9F032-21-0447.

**Reference Information**
* Solicitation Number: 9F032-21-0447
* GSIN Code: D302A - Informatics Professional Services
* NPP Publication Date: October 5, 2022
* Tender Closing Date: October 21, 2022, at 14:00 PM (HAE)

**Notice Description**
The CSA seeks services for the designated Task-Based Informatics Professional Service: Requirements for services (TBIPS) to support the Agency's [2] objectives.

**Evaluation Criteria**
The selection of the successful bidder will be based on the evaluation criteria outlined in the Solicitation Document.

**Tender Location**
This tender is open to bidders in Quebec, excluding the National Capital Region (NCR), and nationwide via the Canadabuy Network.

**Trade Agreements**
The CSA has included several trade agreements in this tender to ensure compliance with all applicable regulations and policies.

**Contract Duration**
The contract duration is expected to be one year after the award date, as per the terms outlined in the Solicitation Document.

**Comprehensive Land Claim Agreement (CLCA) and Trade Agreements**
This tender does not apply to the Comprehensive Land Claim Agreement. The requirement is subject to the provisions of the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA).

**Accessing Additional Information**
Bidders seeking more information on this tender are required to contact Julie Mercier, the designated contact person, using the information outlined below:

 Julie Mercier
Email: [julie.mercier@asc-csa.gc.ca](mailto:julie.mercier@asc-csa.gc.ca)

**Attachments**

To view the complete tender documents and notices, please visit the Canadabuy website via the following links:

* https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/10/07/6adff69b82ec1e0b53a1f4580fc41206/9f032-21-0447_apm_mod_1_-_spict.pdf
* https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/10/05/70ae95f1752ce64702
